root.name: Rocky Memphis and the Temple of Ophuxoff
root.description: OverviewRocky Memphis and the Temple of Ophuxoff is a cave exploration game styled similarly to Commodore 64 games, complete with a chiptune soundtrack. The game was developed by Trevor Storey (art), Stuart Collier (code), and Timo Taipalus (sound), and was released on December 7, 2010 for both Mac and PC. The titular star of Rocky Memphis must traverse the game's 600+ rooms, collecting 4000 pieces of treasure in order to complete the game. Rocky Memphis also has online leaderboards, which are also recorded on the game's website.Rocky Memphis and the Temple of Ophuxoff is available for free from games aggregate Ovine.
